video_prompt: Ant on a motorcycle zooms forward, kicking up dust plumes. Content expression shifts slightly as it navigates the road. Bright outdoor environment rushes past.
image_prompt: A full-body, cartoon-style illustration of a smiling ant in a yellow racing suit riding a blue and silver motorcycle on a paved road with green grass and a clear blue sky, with motion blur effects. The ant has a glossy black head and large, round, dark brown eyes. The motorcycle has prominent blue fenders and a silver engine. Clean, vibrant, children's book style.
refined_video_prompt: Rapid forward acceleration propels the vehicle. Dust plumes erupt behind it. The rider's facial expression subtly transitions from contentment to focused navigation. The bright outdoor background blurs swiftly, conveying high speed.
